name: In re Richard K. McCARTHY, District Justice in and for Magisterial District 05-04-01, Allegheny County. Appeal of: Richard K. McCarthy

parties: In re Richard K. McCARTHY, District Justice in and for Magisterial District 05-04-01, Allegheny County. Appeal of: Richard K. McCarthy.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 23rd day of December, 2003, the order of the Court of Judicial Discipline is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
839 A.2d 182
In re Richard K. McCARTHY, District Justice in and for Magisterial District 05-04-01, Allegheny County. Appeal of: Richard K. McCarthy.

Dec. 23, 2003.
